Topic.Title: Increase UI Size when playing a game?

Posts.EditableText: I am playing Whitefield Academy of Witchcraft offline in Quest 5.8. The UI (e.g. Compass, Inventory, Status, etc...) is pretty small and I don't see anyway to zoom in. Is there anyway to scale the UI?
Posts.HTML: I am playing Whitefield Academy of Witchcraft offline in Quest 5.8. The UI (e.g. Compass, Inventory, Status, etc...) is pretty small and I don't see anyway to zoom in. Is there anyway to scale the UI?

Posts.EditableText: Not sure, but I think some of the default chromium shortcuts are available unless explicitly disabled. So Ctrl+scroll wheel might allow you to zoom (assuming your mouse has one).
